burned because they contained a

because he was a great experimental
scientist his measurements were correct
so he managed to measure that water is
made of two parts of hydrogen to one
part of oxygen h2o even though he didn't
believe that water was made of anything
at all so that ability to get your
theoretical picture your ideas about the
way that nature works completely wrong
and yet make honest and precise
